text:
QUESTION 04) Breaded Overa en Bayo Claro, Vaquilla Echada, Eres Del Vino Tinto LaDorada.
[...] Vienes Llena de Pino, Cebolla y Meat, Pasa, Huevo Duro, Y Ali√±o of Hambre. Con El Primer Mordisco by Una Oreja, if you open your burning mouth as sorval. Te la lleno of pebling falls spicy si te beeso muy fuerte, in the complaints. I seek, loco, in you.
[...] Y Repeat El Attack by Andanados: Nadie Fall with Hambre Si Hay Empanadas.
Accessed on: 8 Dec. 2018 (fragment).
Gastronomy is one of the forms of cultural expression of a people. In this poem, by personifying the empanadas, the Chilean writer Antrix
A) Praise this dish of Hispanic cuisine.
B) describes some steps of preparation of this recipe.
C) Highlights the importance of wine in Hispanic food.
D) rescues the historical role of this food in times of hunger.
E) highlights the relevance of some condiments in Hispanic cuisine.
